sentences.english: Among them, there was the herb Tuckahoe grown in Yunnan and Guizhou provinces.
sentences.chinese: 這些中藥中就有生長於雲南和貴州的茯苓。

sentences.english: Later, she often granted the pie to the ministers of the palace as a reward.
sentences.chinese: 以後，她就經常把茯苓餅賞給那些王公大臣。

sentences.english: Processing methods have certain influence on chemical constituents in Poria cocos herbs.
sentences.chinese: 炮製加工對茯苓飲片的化學成分有一定的影響。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the extraction process of polysaccharide from Atractylodes Poria soup.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究白朮茯苓湯總多糖的提取工藝。

sentences.english: Objective To study on the development of Shang Poria Cocos .
sentences.chinese: 目的研究商茯苓的發展狀況。

sentences.english: It is the time to plant Smilax glabra.
sentences.chinese: 現在是種土茯苓的時候。

sentences.english: Peppermint Leaf, Flos Lonicerae, Rhizoma Smilacis Glabrae, Radix Rehmanniae.
sentences.chinese: 薄荷葉，金銀花，土茯苓，生地。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo optimize extraction method of pachyman in poria cocos (Schw. ) wolf.
sentences.chinese: 目的優選茯苓多糖的提取方法。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo research on the in vitro growth inhibition effect of SGR on bacteria.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討土茯苓的體外抑菌作用。

sentences.english: This paper compared several Fuling( Poria coccus)extracting techniques.
sentences.chinese: 本實驗比較了茯苓多糖的幾種提取工藝。

sentences.english: Objective It is to discuss the anti-tumor mechanism of Cinnamon Twig and Poria decoction(CTPD).
sentences.chinese: 目的探討桂枝茯苓湯抗腫瘤的作用機制。

sentences.english: Poria Yuexi Yuexi specialty, particularly fine texture.
sentences.chinese: 嶽西茯苓嶽西特產，質地特別優良。

sentences.english: The content of water-soluble polysaccharide of fermentation mycelia and natural Poria was also compared.
sentences.chinese: 並將發酵菌絲與天然茯苓進行水溶性多糖含量比較。

definition: the rhizome of large-headed atractylodes (Atractylodes macrocephaia)
root of herbaceous peony (Paeonia lactiflora), used in TCM
huangqi/milk vetch root (used in TCM)/Astragalus membranaceus or Astragalus mongholicus
Ningpo figwort (Scrophularia ningpoensis)/root of Ningpo figwort (used in TCM)
common water plantain (Alisma plantago-aquatica)/water plantain rhizome (used in TCM)
dwarf lilyturf (Ophiopogon japonicus), its tuber used in TCM
black atractylodes rhizome (dried rhizome of any of several atractylodes species) (TCM)
Amomom (fructus Amomi), plant used in Chinese medicine
King Solomon's seal (plant of genus Polygonatum)
